where.label: wr2

where.label: wr1
where.expression: sizeof ( typeof ( self ) - ( typeof ( self \ representation || self \ representation_relationship || self \ parameter_assignment_override ) ) ) = 0

where.expression: self \ representation_relationship . rep_1 <> self \ representation_relationship . rep_2
